DOCNAME: CASE OF VORONTSOV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 3 - Prohibition of torture (Article 3 - Degrading treatment) (Substantive aspect)
JUDGES: Alena Poláčková;Branko Lubarda;Dmitry Dedov;Georgios A. Serghides;Helen Keller;Helena Jäderblom;Luis López Guerra
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants were born in DATE , DATE and DATE respectively and lived before their convictions in GPE , GPE and GPE .
CARDINAL . The facts of the applications , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was arrested on suspicion of having committed a crime .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of GPE ( “ the ORG ” ) remanded the applicant in custody .
CARDINAL . On DATE and DATE , and DATE ORG extended the applicant ’s detention until DATE , CARDINAL DATE and CARDINAL DATE respectively .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG convicted the applicant of robbery and sentenced him to DATE and CARDINAL months’ imprisonment . The applicant appealed .
CARDINAL . During the hearings before ORG on DATE , DATE , CARDINAL DATE , and CARDINAL DATE , and DATE , DATE , DATE and DATE , and CARDINAL , DATE and DATE the applicant was held in a metal cage .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of DATE on appeal .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of GPE convicted the applicant of embezzlement and the illegal acquisition , storage , transfer , transportation and possession of firearms and sentenced him to CARDINAL years’ imprisonment .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ( “ the ORG ” ) convicted the applicant of fraud committed through abuse of position and sentenced him to a fine .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of the Chuvash Republic reduced the applicant ’s fine .

CARDINAL . NORP However , on DATE the Presidium of ORG of GPE granted a cassation appeal lodged by ORG and quashed the judgment of CARDINAL DATE and the appeal decision of CARDINAL DATE . The case was remitted to ORG for fresh examination .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG convicted the applicant on CARDINAL counts of fraud , acquitted him of a further CARDINAL counts of fraud and sentenced him to DATE imprisonment , taking into account the fact that the applicant had not fully served the sentence imposed on him on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of the Chuvash Republic reclassified the CARDINAL counts of fraud on which the applicant had been convicted and sentenced him to DATE imprisonment . As regards the CARDINAL counts of fraud of which the applicant had been acquitted , ORG quashed the judgment on appeal and remitted the case for fresh examination . Those proceedings are still pending .
CARDINAL . During the proceedings before ORG and ORG of GPE the applicant was confined in a metal cage .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was arrested on suspicion of having committed a crime .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of GPE ( “ the ORG ” ) remanded the applicant in custody .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG extended the applicant ’s detention .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG convicted the applicant of inflicting grievous bodily harm and sentenced him to CARDINAL years’ imprisonment .
CARDINAL . NORP The applicant was confined in a metal cage when the custodial measure was applied to him , when it was subsequently extended and during the trial .
